comment:
Separated into 3x5 gallon batches for fermentation. Adding the yeast, 1-per-batch.  
For dry hopping, will add:
[1st batch: 1.0 oz Amarillo (US) & 1.0 oz Cascade (US)] [2nd batch, add 1.0 oz Simcoe & 1.0 oz Cascade (US)] [3rd batch: 1oz Amarillo & 1oz Simcoe]  All batches will get tangerine peel.
